name: Tres router
description_long: This is the router package used for Tres Framework. This is a
stand-alone package, which means that it can also be used without
A router generally forwards you to something. The router takes the
URI, matches it with a list and takes action based on that.
This technique adds a degree of separation between the files used
to generate a webpage and the URL that is presented to the world.
An addition to that is not only that it is search engine friendly,
